products.description: This Compact cotton Jacquard Backpack, with two large compartments, has a small compartment in front too. 3 Inside pockets with a front pocket help the user organize their belongings for easy retrieval and makes it ideal for daily use as well as a travel backpack. Ruffle beach bags: Introducing three stunning ruffle beach bags that are big enough to carry all your essentials, and are so boho and chic that you would want to take them pretty much everywhere with you. It comes with the versatility of #beyondthebeach and the freedom to express the beach kid inside you. Featuring a zipper closure and three inner pockets, it provides an easy access to your daily essentials while securing them for you at the same time.

This colorful and trendy backpack can be carried in 3 ways – as a backpack, as a handbag and as a messenger bag. It has one main compartment with a padded section for laptop. It has 2 small pockets for mobile wallet etc and one large pocket for papers, small folder etc. hidden by the front flap. On the side are open pockets which can carry small water bottle or charger etc. The fabric is durable canvas and the flap is made of colorful cotton jacquard fabric.
